mapper.select: SELECT er.record_number AS record_number, er.name AS name, p.name AS position_name, er.title AS title, er.salary_standard_id AS salary_standard_id, ss.name AS salary_standard_name, temp.salary_standard_total_amount AS salary_standard_amount FROM employee_record er JOIN position p ON er.position_id = p.id JOIN salary_standard ss ON er.salary_standard_id = ss.id JOIN (SELECT ssi.salary_standard_id, SUM(IF(si.is_deduction, ssi.money * -1, ssi.money)) AS salary_standard_total_amount FROM salary_standard_item ssi JOIN salary_item si ON ssi.salary_item_id = si.id GROUP BY ssi.salary_standard_id) AS temp ON er.salary_standard_id = temp.salary_standard_id WHERE er.status = '正常' AND ss.status = '正常' AND er.position_id IS NOT NULL;
